text: Asteropeia rhopaloides is a species of plant in the Asteropeiaceae family. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Madagascar rhopaloides Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Asteropeia rhopaloides
